name: dev
description: A set of utility commands for the developers

options.name: patron
options.description: Toggles the patron status of a guild

options.name: guild
options.description: The ID of the guild to toggle

options.name: dev
options.description: Toggles the dev status of a guild

options.name: guild
options.description: The ID of the guild to toggle

options.name: maxcal
options.description: Changes the max calendars a guild may have

options.name: guild
options.description: The ID of the guild to change

options.name: amount
options.description: The max amount of calendars this guild may have

options.name: api-register
options.description: Registers a new API key for the user

options.name: user
options.description: The user who uses the API key being created

options.name: api-block
options.description: Sets an API key as blocked and prevents its use
